original_title: Eddy Merckx i n√¶rheden af en kop kaffe
overview: With a slow introductory zoom onto Leth in a TV studio and a corresponding zoom out at the end Eddy Merckx in the Vicinity of a Cup of Coffee may be structured in the classical style but an extremely unusual TV production is involved: in the studio Leth reads from his poetry while a subtitle - like in Life in Denmark - pedantically but ambiguously presents observations and describes what is going on.
title: Eddy Merckx in the Vicinity of a Cup of Coffee
